org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin22.util

Class WholeBeanValidationBinder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vaadin.flow.data.binder.Binder<BEAN>
      • com.vaadin.flow.data.binder.BeanValidationBinder<T>
        • org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin22.util.WholeBeanValidationBinder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - bean type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class WholeBeanValidationBinder<T>
extends BeanValidationBinder<T>
    A BeanValidationBinder which also validates any bean validation constraints imposed on the bean itself (not to an individual property).

    This is done simply by adding a WholeBeanValidator.

    For this binder to validate, there must be an actual bean bound (via setBean()), otherwise you'll get an IllegalStateException with bean level validators have been configured but no bean is currently set.

    See Also:
    WholeBeanValidator, Serialized Form
